text: @SpeakerPelosi You+ Schumer should be ashamed of your brazen attempts to politicize the Coronavirus. Shows your desperation. Bernie’s rise is your fault. You gave in to the far left, anti-Semitic, America hating wing of the party, +spent all your political capital trying to get rid of Trump.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
